name: Test Chamber (Ema H.)
description:
Enable fullscreen

Test Chamber is a game about trying to escape from a virtual room. Unfortunately we didn't have time to implement the music.

Controls:

  • A&D - left and right
  • W - jump
  • Space - interact

Tools:

  • Engine: Unity3d 5.5
  • Art: Photoshop CS6

Made by ema1ih (Game Developper) and culin (Game Art).
